legal.a: Yes. Torre Tempo fully complies with RD-Ley 8/2019 which requires companies to record working hours. We keep records for 5 years and they are available for inspection.

offline.a: Yes. Clock-ins are saved on the device and sync automatically when connection returns. You'll never lose a record.

data.a: All data is stored on servers within the European Union, complying with GDPR. We do not share data with third parties.
